Title: Fate's Right Hand
Plot: Raylan guides Ava through the process of informing on Boyd and tries to turn Boyd's old ally Dewey Crowe against him as well, all while Boyd works to pull off a daring heist right under Raylan's nose.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
Writer: Michael Dinner, Fred Golan, Chris Provenzano
